static LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.io.EsriGrid.read ( Reader  inputFile,
DataTransform  t 
) [static] 

00041                                                                      {
00042         BufferedReader reader = null;
00043         try {
00044             reader = new BufferedReader(inputFile);
00045             // fields separated by spaces. This is the regular expression for spaces
00046             final String sep = " +";
00047             // read header
00048             int ncols = Integer.parseInt( reader.readLine().split(sep)[1] );
00049             int nrows = Integer.parseInt( reader.readLine().split(sep)[1] );
00050             double cornerlon = Double.parseDouble( reader.readLine().split(sep)[1] );
00051             double cornerlat = Double.parseDouble( reader.readLine().split(sep)[1] );
00052             double latres = Double.parseDouble( reader.readLine().split(sep)[1] );
00053             double lonres = latres;
00054             String missingValue = reader.readLine().split(sep)[1];
00055             int missing = Integer.parseInt(missingValue);
00056 
00057             // read in data
00058             int[][] data = new int[nrows][ncols];
00059             int numvalid = 0;
00060             int nummissing = 0;
00061             int numzero = 0;
00062             int minval = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
00063             int maxval = 0;
00064             int i = 0;
00065             int j = 0;
00066             String line = null;
00067             while ( (line = reader.readLine()) != null ){
00068                 for (String field : line.split(sep)){
00069                     if (field.equals(missingValue)){
00070                         data[i][j] = missing;
00071                         ++nummissing;
00072                     } else {
00073                         double value = Double.parseDouble(field);
00074                         data[i][j] = t.transformAndRoundoff(value);
00075                         if ( data[i][j] != 0 ){
00076                             ++numvalid;
00077                             minval = Math.min(minval, data[i][j]);
00078                             maxval = Math.max(maxval, data[i][j]);
00079                         } else {
00080                             ++numzero;
00081                         }
00082                     }
00083                     ++j; // next column
00084                     if ( j == ncols ){
00085                         j = 0; // next row
00086                         ++i;
00087                     }
00088                 }
00089             }
00090             System.out.println(numvalid + " valid pixels; " + numzero + " zero; " + nummissing + " " + missing + " range=[" + minval + "," + maxval +"]");
00091             LatLon nwCorner = new LatLon(cornerlat + latres*nrows, cornerlon);
00092             return new LatLonGrid(data, missing, nwCorner, latres, lonres);
00093         } catch (Exception e){
00094             System.err.println("Error reading file: " + e);
00095             throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
00096         } finally {
00097             if (reader != null) {
00098                 try{
00099                     reader.close();
00100                 } catch (Exception e){
00101                     // okay
00102                 }
00103             }
00104         }
00105     }

) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException [static] 

00030                                                                                                         {
00031         Reader f = null;
00032         if (file.getAbsolutePath().endsWith(".gz")) {
00033             f = new InputStreamReader(new GZIPInputStream(new FileInputStream(
00034                     file)));
00035         } else {
00036             f = new FileReader(file);
00037         }
00038         return read(f, t);
00039     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.io.EsriGrid.write ( LatLonGrid  data,
File  out 
) throws IOException [static] 

00112                                                                            {
00113         PrintWriter writer = null;
00114         try {
00115             writer = new PrintWriter(new GZIPOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(out)));
00116             int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00117             int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00118             writer.println("ncols " + ncols);
00119             writer.println("nrows " + nrows);
00120             writer.println("xllcorner " + data.getNwCorner().getLon());
00121             writer.println("yllcorner " + (data.getNwCorner().getLat() - data.getLatRes()*data.getNumLat()));
00122             writer.println("cellsize " + data.getLatRes());
00123             writer.println("NODATA_value " + data.getMissing());
00124 
00125             final String sep = " ";
00126             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00127                 for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00128                     writer.print(data.getValue(i,j));
00129                     if (j != (ncols-1)){
00130                         writer.print(sep);
00131                     }
00132                 }
00133                 writer.println();
00134             }
00135         } finally {
00136             if (writer != null){
00137                 System.out.println("Successfully wrote " + out);
00138                 writer.close();
00139             }
00140         }
00141     }
